title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Hello,

We have a beautiful product for your Christmas decoration. It is a "Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set". This set is very nice for making your home look festive.

The wreath is big with a size of 23.6 inches wide. The garland is long too, 8.8 feet. They have decorations like snowflake pine needle branches, two kinds of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. It looks very much like real and very pretty.

There are 100 LED lights that give warm light. These lights use 3 AA batteries. They are not in the box, you must buy them. The lights have a timer. They stay on for 6 hours and then off for 18 hours. It is automatic.

You do not need to put the set together. It comes ready to use. The materials are very good. They are strong and do not cause allergies. The pins do not catch fire.

You can use this set inside or outside. It will not fade or need water. You can hang it on the wall, door, by the fireplace, or in many rooms like living room, bedroom, or dining room. It is also good for windows.

We give you a warranty for 365 days. If you have a problem, we have customer service every hour, all day.

We hope you like this Christmas decoration. It is strong, looks nice, and is easy to use.

Thank you.

Hello Dear Customer,

We present to you our beautiful product, the Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This set is very nice for decoration and brings festive mood. The size of the wreath is big, 23.6 inches across. The garland is long enough, 8.8 feet, to look good on walls or around doors.

Our set has many things to make nice view. There are snowflake pine needle branches, two kinds of pine cones, groups of berries, and frosted branches. Also, it has 100 LED lights that give warm feeling. These lights work with 3 AA batteries. They are smart because they turn on for 6 hours and then off for 18 hours by themselves.

No need to build or put together. It is ready for you to use. We use very good materials that are strong and don't cause allergies. Also, they are safe against fire. This set is very tough and will last for long time. You don't need water, and it will not lose its color.

You can use this set inside or outside. It is good for many places like wall, door, fireplace, and different rooms in your house. If you have windows, it will look beautiful there too.

We care for our customers, so we give warranty for 365 days. If you need help, our customer service is here all time, every day.

We are happy if you choose our Christmas decoration. It will make your place very nice for the holiday.

Thank you,
[Your Factory Name/Your Name]
